name: 10 Day Tour Of Cusco
description: This tour combines one of the most popular treks to Machu Picchu with a trip to the Amazon jungle. In this tour, you will experience some of the best that Southern Peru has to offer, from the breathtaking views of the high mountain passes to the amazing animal and plant life in the Amazon Jungle of Tombopata near the city of Puerto Maldonado. Visit the best of two contrasting climates in this incredible tour 10 day Tour.
